meanings: (알지 못하다) do not know, (이해하지 못하다) do not understand
(경험이 없다) have no experience, be ignorant of
with an air of innocence(관계가 없는 듯이)

feigned ignorance, [무관심] an unconcerned[a nonchalant] air, indifference, nonchalance. 모른체하다 [무관심] look on ((something)) with indifference[an unconcerned air], be indifferent ((to)), [길거리에서 만났을 때] cut ((a person)) (dead), look the other way, pretend not to r...
[무관심] look on with indifference [an unconcerned air], be indifferent, [길에서] cut
look the other way, pretend not to recognize
[시치미 뗌] feign [affect] ignorance, pretend not to know, play innocent.

vlive.korean: [모른 척1] 뭔 스피커? [Pretending not to know 1] What speaker? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
[누구인지 모른 채 코디 만나러 가는 길] 어디로 갈까? [They're on their way to meet their coordinator] Where are we going? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: [They're on their way to meet their coordinator] Where are we going?

vlive.korean: [오호 그럴 리가~?] 모른 척... [That can't happen...] You're pretending... 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV6] EP13 비글로 돌아온 마마무
왜 모른 척하세요? Why are you pretending not to know about it? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 변태 선생 경찰차에 태우는 법_EP22_[라이크LIKE]

vlive.english: [Pretending that he does not know] Explain what?

examples.korean: I could no longer ignore the fact that he was deeply unhappy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그가 몹시 불행하다는 점을 더 이상 모른 척 할 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could no longer ignore the fact that he was deeply unhappy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. (Thomas A. Edison) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인생에서 실패한 사람 중 다수는 성공을 목전에 두고도 모른 채 포기한 이들이다. (토마스 A. 에디슨, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. (Thomas A. Edison) Add to Wordbook
